mapper.sql: working_procedure_id AS " workingProcedureId", user_id AS "userId", working_procedure_class AS "workingProcedureClass",production_station_id AS "productionStationId", accessories AS "accessories", remark AS "remark", working_procedure_name AS "workingProcedureName"
mapper.select:
select
from working_procedure where 1 = 1
and working_procedure_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition. workingProcedureId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and production_station_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionStationId},'%')
and accessories like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.accessories},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
